name: Reunion at Yangren
description:
Fan Dao is a young soldier from the southlands, pulled away from planning his upcoming wedding to fight for Sun Jian as a member of the Anti-Dong Zhuo Coalition. Set in the late 2nd Century, near the end of the Han Dynasty this war would be one of the catalysts that set the Three Kingdoms period in motion.

Along with Dao are his childhood friends, the rambunctious tomboy Yuying and the ditzy, but good-hearted, beefcake Xi. After being separated from Sun Jian's army at Liangdong, they must head for Yangren to reunite with their army. But with the mighty warrior Hua Xiong on their tail looking for heads to round out his collection, will they make it?

Will they reconnect with their army, and their loved ones back one? Or perhaps will they make new connections with new friends? Or maybe even make new connections with each other?

You decide Dao and his friends' fates.

Currently 3 possible endings:

Bad Ending (Dao dies)

Yuying's Ending

Wenwen's Ending

See if you can get all three, or at least the good two. Not gonna lie, there's a couple spots where you can get the bad one. ;)

-Button Mapping-

Left Click - Advance Dialogue/Make Selection

Enter - Advance Dialogue

Space/Right Click - Hide Message (to view background/pictures)

Mouse Scroll Up - Message Backlog

Mouse Scroll Down - Advance Dialogue

You can also click on the cog wheel in the bottom right of the screen to access the save/load menu and other features.

Note: The opening narration is not skippable in the current version - sorry; making it skippable broke things.
